doc.field: All WTC related. Thick folder of tearsheets, webpage prints re: "progressive collapse" (i.e., building collapses vertically rather than topples), with a CD of a YouTube editorial on building collapse; these articles relate to both WTC specifically and design matter generally (circa 2004-11). Booklets on the health impact of WTC (circa 2007), including specifically on FDNY rescue workers; also a thick folder of tearsheets etc on health impact (Spadafora's filing with FDNY as working at Ground Zero is in here among webpage prints). Report "Investigation of Administrative Issues Relating to the Fatal Fire of August 18, 2007 at 130 Liberty Street", with attachments (2009). Draft (public) of NIST report on the collapse of WTC building 7 (collapsed at 5:20 on 9/11), 2008. Print matter: Langewiesche's book "American Ground." Several CDs and DVDs re: WTC 7 collapse (2007-08), 1 WTC walkthrough and standpipe test (2012), WTC Building Code Task Force, Freedom Tower, WTC Gallery Photos 11/11. (Includes digital formats)
